SCTX:
Begin hlaaluPrisonGuard

short doOnce
float timer

if ( GetJournalIndex HR_Stronghold < 141 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex HR_Stronghold >= 144 )
	if ( doOnce == 1 )
		StopCombat
		Set doOnce to 2
	endif
	Return
endif

if ( doOnce > 0 )
	Return
endif

Set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )

if ( timer > 1 )
	Set timer to 0
	if ( GetDetected Player == 1 )
		StartCombat Player
		Set doOnce to 1
	endif
endif

End
